name: African Staircase - With Multiplayer!
description:
An epic multiplayer game in Africa that contains many features such as:

- Climb the staircase!

-Fall off the staircase!

-Laugh at how hilariously bad this joke of a game is

Note: This is obviously a joke! Don't get offended by anything in the game apart from the quality of this garbage "game". This was made in a short time as a joke

Mac coming later (my friends don't use mac so I haven't exported to mac yet)
